alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 28 at 10:33AM MST until December 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West-southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe County, Quay County, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County
